Container.Name: moonlight-web-stream
Container.Overview: Moonlight Web exposes the Moonlight client through a browser-based WebRTC streaming experience. This template deploys the moonlight-web-stream container with configurable bind address, TURN/STUN credentials, and persistent storage aimed at Unraid systems.

Config.Name: AppData Storage
Config.Description: Persistent Moonlight Web configuration, data.json, credentials, and certificates.

Config.Name: Web UI Port
Config.Description: Port exposed for the Moonlight Web interface.

Config.Name: WebRTC UDP Range
Config.Description: UDP port range forwarded for WebRTC peers.

Config.Name: Bind IP
Config.Description: Interface inside the container to bind the web server to.

Config.Name: Internal Web Port
Config.Description: Port number written into the Moonlight Web config. Update this if you change the container web port.

Config.Name: ICE Server Credential
Config.Description: Credential or password for TURN server authentication.

Config.Name: NAT 1:1 IPs
Config.Description: Comma separated list of public IPs advertised to clients.

Config.Name: NAT Candidate Type
Config.Description: ICE candidate type advertised for NAT 1:1 mappings (host or srflx).

Config.Name: WebRTC Port Min
Config.Description: Lowest UDP port used for WebRTC streams.

Config.Name: WebRTC Port Max
Config.Description: Highest UDP port used for WebRTC streams.

Config.Name: WebRTC Network Types
Config.Description: Comma separated list of allowed WebRTC network types.

Config.Name: Sunshine HTTP Port
Config.Description: Default Sunshine HTTP port used when pairing hosts.

Config.Name: Pair Device Name
Config.Description: Logical device name presented while pairing with Sunshine.

Config.Name: Web Path Prefix
Config.Description: Optional path prefix when running behind a reverse proxy.

Config.Name: Auth Password
Config.Description: Optional password protecting the web UI. Set to 'null' to disable authentication.
